title: How to Make Spiced Cherries

steps.headline: Clean the cherries.
steps.description: Discard any that are marked (eat them! ).

steps.headline: Put the clean cherries into a large jar that has been warmed slightly.
Combine the vinegar, sugar, cloves, peppercorns and cinnamon sticks in a saucepan.
steps.description: Bring to the boil and allow to boil for 2 minutes.

steps.headline: Pour this hot vinegar mix over the cherries in the jar.
steps.description: Cover the fruit completely with the vinegar mix.

steps.headline: Cover the jar with a cloth and put somewhere out of the way for one week.
steps.description: During this time, the cherries are pickling.

steps.headline: Pour the vinegar off into a saucepan after one week.
steps.description: Bring it to boil and pour over the cherries again. Allow the contents to cool completely before sealing tightly. Store in a cool place or the refrigerator.

text: Clean the cherries. Discard any that are marked (eat them! ). Put the clean cherries into a large jar that has been warmed slightly.  Combine the vinegar, sugar, cloves, peppercorns and cinnamon sticks in a saucepan. Bring to the boil and allow to boil for 2 minutes. Pour this hot vinegar mix over the cherries in the jar. Cover the fruit completely with the vinegar mix. Cover the jar with a cloth and put somewhere out of the way for one week. During this time, the cherries are pickling. Pour the vinegar off into a saucepan after one week. Bring it to boil and pour over the cherries again. Allow the contents to cool completely before sealing tightly. Store in a cool place or the refrigerator. Finished.
